body:
Just trying out this AMA thing and check if their will be someone asking me something..

Go ahead and ask what you want and i'll be as honest i can on these ''opinion'' questions.
body_tagged:
Just trying out this AMA thing and check if their will be someone asking me something..

Go ahead and ask what you want and i'll be as honest i can on these ''opinion'' questions.
title: (AMA) Capenage / Ludcha!

replies.body:
Opinions?

Favourite chocolate?
Do you prefer cakes or cookies?

Any pets?

Ooooooch förresten, har ni snö där borta? Vi har! :D
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?

Favourite chocolate?
Do you prefer cakes or cookies?

Any pets?

Ooooooch förresten, har ni snö där borta? Vi har! :D

replies.body:
Oh shit I remember you from ocn 

My ign was diabolicforce and we used to be on the translator team if you remember (I think)
replies.body_tagged:
Oh shit I remember you from ocn 

My ign was diabolicforce and we used to be on the translator team if you remember (I think)

replies.body:
Opinions?

What place do you think Ozone will get in the mini event
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?

What place do you think Ozone will get in the mini event

replies.body:
You're an underrated player. Very nice and fun to talk to!

My favourite chocolate is either Fazer chocolate or Marabou white chocolate.
I prefer cookies, but it depends tho. 

I don't have any pet(s).

Ja, det är snö här hehe. Snöat 2 dagar i streck men sen nu under natten så regnade det. Nu är det typ slask, som vanligt..

replies.body:
You are a cool guy, a great leader, fun talking to and generally a good pvper with strong leadership skills.

I think Ozone will come up high. Depends on who'll be active and all that of course. But i'll be cheering for Ozone.
